official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a bipartisan study group be established to consider the institution of a Federal college for ombudsman training.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a bipartisan study group be established to consider the institution of a Federal college for ombudsman training.
